name: .JTX File Extension
summary: Learn about .JTX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Text file written using the JTX markup format, which is used for specifying the content of an HTML notebook; contains a table or contents and notebook page data; allows Jrju to build a hierarchical notebook with cross-references and HTML links.

content: Jrju is distributed as Perl script that generates HTML files from a JTX text file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
